description: This file defines a React functional component CalendarGrid that renders a calendar month view with interactive date cells, badges showing counts of itinerary items, notes, and reminders, and supports date selection. It imports React and a utility function getMonthGridCells, and uses props for dynamic rendering of the calendar grid.

methods.name: CalendarGrid({ monthKey, selectedDateKey, countsByDate, onSelectDate })
methods.description: React functional component that displays a calendar month with clickable date cells, badges for counts, and selection highlighting.

ctags.name: CalendarGrid
ctags.pattern: /^export function CalendarGrid({ monthKey, selectedDateKey, countsByDate, onSelectDate }) {$/
